hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah reported the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) as saying:when one of you prostrates himself he must not kneel in the manner of camel, but should put down his hands before his knees

chapter.ara-name: باب كَيْفَ يَضَعُ رُكْبَتَيْهِ قَبْلَ يَدَيْهِ
chapter.eng-name: How Should One Place His Knees Before His Hands (While Going Into Prostration)
